original_text: At that time, King Herod took hold of some of the group of believers in Jerusalem. He wanted to cause them to suffer.
korean_text: 그 때에 헤롯 왕이 손을 들어 교회 중에서 몇 사람을 해하려 하여

sentences.original_text: took hold of some of the group of believers
sentences.korean_translation: 믿는 자들 중 몇 사람을 잡았다

sentences.original_text: He wanted to cause them to suffer
